entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
